entry.title: real topography for revit and twinmotion
entry.content:
tool: Infraworks, Navisworks, Fromit, Revit

when you rending in Twinmotion, you can adjust the topograhy by editing ã€Œlandscapeã€, but itâ€™s more accurate and convenient when you import the topo from the Revit file first.

here is the way i made the real topo for revit:

combine these two viedos:
